mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, pwd, type, name, tell, status, confirm, grade, joindate, finaldate) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{type}, #{name}, #{tell}, 1, #{confirm}, 1, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT mno, id, name, type, birth, tell, status, confirm, grade, joindate, finaldate FROM member
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, tell = #{tell}, birth = #{birth}, status = #{status}, grade = #{grade}, WHERE id = #{id}
